channel.title: CVE Feed for Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-34391|2023-08-31T15:31:45.454Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-5033%20acselerator%20rtac%20software
item.description:
Insecure Inherited Permissions vulnerability in Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-5033 AcSELerator RTAC Software on Windows allows Leveraging/Manipulating Configuration File Search Paths.
See Instruction Manual Appendix A [Cybersecurity] tag dated 20230522 for more details.
This issue affects SEL-5033 AcSELerator RTAC Software: before 1.35.151.21000.

item.title: CVE-2023-34390|2023-11-30T16:54:54.190Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-451
item.description:
An input validation vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-451 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to create a denial of service against the system and locking out services.
See product Instruction Manual Appendix A dated 20230830 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-34389|2023-11-30T16:54:29.986Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-451
item.description:
An allocation of resources without limits or throttling vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-451 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to make the system unavailable for an indefinite amount of time.
See product Instruction Manual Appendix A dated 20230830 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-34388|2023-11-30T16:54:08.503Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-451
item.description:
An Improper Authentication vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-451 could allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to potentially perform session hijacking attack and bypass authentication.
See product Instruction Manual Appendix A dated 20230830 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-34392|2023-08-31T15:31:57.140Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-5037%20sel%20grid%20configurator
item.description:
A Missing Authentication for Critical Function vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-5037 SEL Grid Configurator could allow an attacker to run arbitrary commands on managed devices by an authorized device operator.
See Instruction Manual Appendix A and Appendix E dated 20230615 for more details.
This issue affects SEL-5037 SEL Grid Configurator: before 4.5.0.20.

item.title: CVE-2023-31150|2023-05-10T19:21:07.126Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description: A Storing Passwords in a Recoverable Format vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) database system could allow an authenticated attacker to retrieve passwords. See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31170|2023-08-31T15:30:32.665Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-5030%20acselerator%20quickset%20software
item.description:
An Inclusion of Functionality from Untrusted Control Sphere vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-5030 acSELerator QuickSet Software could allow an attacker to embed instructions that could be executed by an authorized device operator.
See Instruction Manual Appendix A and Appendix E dated 20230615 for more details.
This issue affects SEL-5030 acSELerator QuickSet Software: through 7.1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-31166|2023-05-10T19:25:59.606Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description:
An Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) Web Interface could allow a remote authenticated attacker to create folders in arbitrary paths of the file system.
See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31167|2023-08-31T15:29:11.745Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-5036%20acselerator%20bay%20screen%20builder%20software
item.description:
Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-5036 acSELerator Bay Screen Builder Software on Windows allows Relative Path Traversal.
SEL acSELerator Bay Screen Builder software is distributed by SEL-5033 SEL acSELerator RTAC, SEL-5030 Quickset, and SEL Compass. CVE-2023-31167 and was patched in the acSELerator Bay Screen Builder release available on 20230602. Please contact SEL for additional details.
This issue affects SEL-5036 acSELerator Bay Screen Builder Software: before 1.0.49152.778.

item.title: CVE-2023-31171|2023-08-31T15:30:41.030Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-5030%20acselerator%20quickset%20software
item.description:
An Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-5030 acSELerator QuickSet Software could allow an attacker to embed instructions that could be executed by an authorized device operator.
See Instruction Manual Appendix A and Appendix E dated 20230615 for more details.
This issue affects SEL-5030 acSELerator QuickSet Software: through 7.1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-31151|2023-05-10T19:21:30.649Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description:
An Improper Certificate Validation vulnerability
in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) Web Interface
could allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to conduct a man-in-the-middle (MitM) attack. See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31176|2023-11-30T16:53:11.383Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-451
item.description:
An Insufficient Entropy vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-451 could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to brute-force session tokens and bypass authentication.
See product Instruction Manual Appendix A dated 20230830 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31160|2023-05-10T19:23:43.200Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description:
An Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) Web Interface could allow a remote authenticated attacker to inject and execute arbitrary script code.
See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31156|2023-05-10T19:22:44.225Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description:
An Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) Web Interface could allow a remote authenticated attacker to inject and execute arbitrary script code.
See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31157|2023-05-10T19:22:58.877Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description:
An Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) Web Interface could allow a remote authenticated attacker to inject and execute arbitrary script code.
See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31161|2023-05-10T19:24:03.543Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3532
item.description:
An Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) Web Interface could allow an authenticated remote attacker to use internal resources, allowing a variety of potential effects.
See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31177|2023-11-30T16:53:34.046Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-451
item.description:
An Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-451 could allow an attacker to craft a link that could execute arbitrary code on a victim's system.
See product Instruction Manual Appendix A dated 20230830 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31162|2023-05-10T19:24:20.480Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description:
An Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) Web Interface could allow a remote authenticated attacker to arbitrarily alter the content of a configuration file.
See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31174|2023-08-31T15:31:26.657Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-5037%20sel%20grid%20configurator
item.description:
A Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-5037 SEL Grid Configurator could allow an attacker to embed instructions that could be executed by an authorized device operator.
See Instruction Manual Appendix A and Appendix E dated 20230615 for more details.
This issue affects SEL-5037 SEL Grid Configurator: before 4.5.0.20.

item.description:
An Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) Web Interface could allow a remote authenticated attacker to inject and execute arbitrary script code.
See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.description:

item.title: CVE-2023-31175|2023-08-31T15:31:33.536Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-5037%20sel%20grid%20configurator
item.description:
An Execution with Unnecessary Privileges vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-5037 SEL Grid Configurator could allow an attacker to run system commands with the highest level privilege on the system.
See Instruction Manual Appendix A and Appendix E dated 20230615 for more details.
This issue affects SEL-5037 SEL Grid Configurator: before 4.5.0.20.

item.title: CVE-2023-31163|2023-05-10T19:24:45.965Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description:

item.description:
An Inclusion of Functionality from Untrusted Control Sphere vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-5030 acSELerator QuickSet Software could allow an attacker to embed instructions that could be executed by an authorized device operator.
See Instruction Manual Appendix A and Appendix E dated 20230615 for more details.
This issue affects SEL-5030 acSELerator QuickSet Software: through 7.1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-31152|2023-05-10T19:21:50.029Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description: An Authentication Bypass Using an Alternate Path or Channel vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) Web Interface allows Authentication Bypass. See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31164|2023-05-10T19:25:16.534Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description:

item.title: CVE-2023-31172|2023-08-31T15:30:49.213Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-5030%20acselerator%20quickset%20software
item.description:
An Incomplete Filtering of Special Elements vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-5030 acSELerator QuickSet Software could allow an attacker to embed instructions that could be executed by an authorized device operator.
See Instruction Manual Appendix A and Appendix E dated 20230615 for more details.
This issue affects SEL-5030 acSELerator QuickSet Software: through 7.1.3.0.

item.description:
An Improper Input Validation vulnerability
in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) Web Interface could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code. See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.description:

item.title: CVE-2023-31173|2023-08-31T15:30:58.262Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-5037%20sel%20grid%20configurator
item.description:
Use of Hard-coded Credentials vulnerability in Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-5037 SEL Grid Configurator on Windows allows Authentication Bypass.
See Instruction Manual Appendix A and Appendix E dated 20230615 for more details.
This issue affects SEL-5037 SEL Grid Configurator: before 4.5.0.20.

item.title: CVE-2023-31165|2023-05-10T19:25:34.186Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description:
An Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) Web Interface could allow a remote authenticated attacker to inject and execute arbitrary script code.
See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31153|2023-05-10T19:22:06.307Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description: An Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories Real-Time Automation Controller (SEL RTAC) Web Interface could allow a remote authenticated attacker to inject and execute arbitrary script code.See SEL Service Bulletin dated 2022-11-15 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-31169|2023-08-31T15:30:23.541Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-5030%20acselerator%20quickset%20software
item.description:
An Improper Handling of Unicode Encoding vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-5030 acSELerator QuickSet Software could allow an attacker to embed instructions that could be executed by an authorized device operator.
See Instruction Manual Appendix A and Appendix E dated 20230615 for more details. This issue affects SEL-5030 acSELerator QuickSet Software: through 7.1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-2310|2023-05-10T19:18:43.806Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-3505
item.description:
A Channel Accessible by Non-Endpoint vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL Real-Time Automation Controller (RTAC) could allow a remote attacker to perform a man-in-the-middle (MiTM) that could result in denial of service.
See the ACSELERATOR RTAC SEL-5033 Software instruction manual date code 20210915 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-2265|2023-11-30T16:55:55.901Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-411l
item.description:
An Improper Restriction of Rendered UI Layers or Frames in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-411L could allow an unauthenticated attacker to perform clickjacking based attacks against an authenticated and authorized user.
See product Instruction Manual Appendix A dated 20230830 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-2264|2023-11-30T16:55:28.541Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-411l
item.description:
An improper input validation vulnerability in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-411L could allow a malicious actor to manipulate authorized users to click on a link that could allow undesired behavior.
See product Instruction Manual Appendix A dated 20230830 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-2267|2023-11-30T16:58:44.063Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-411l
item.description:
An Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-411L could allow an attacker to perform reflection attacks against an authorized and authenticated user.
See product Instruction Manual Appendix A dated 20230830 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2023-2266|2023-11-30T16:58:00.174Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-411l
item.description:
An Improper neutralization of input during web page generation in the Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories SEL-411L could allow an attacker to generate cross-site scripting based attacks against an authorized and authenticated user.
See product Instruction Manual Appendix A dated 20230830 for more details.

item.title: CVE-2024-2103|2024-06-04T17:28:59.654Z -- schweitzer%20engineering%20laboratories -- sel-700bt%20motor%20bus%20transfer%20relay
item.description:
Inclusion of undocumented features vulnerability accessible when logged on with a privileged access level on the following Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories relays could allow the relay to behave unpredictably: SEL-700BT Motor Bus Transfer Relay, SEL-700G Generator Protection Relay, SEL-710-5 Motor Protection Relay, SEL-751 Feeder Protection Relay, SEL-787-2/-3/-4 Transformer Protection Relay, SEL-787Z High-Impedance Differential Relay
. See product instruction manual appendix A dated 20240308 for more details regarding the SEL-751 Feeder Protection Relay. For more information for the other affected products, see their instruction manuals dated 20240329.
